Name: Road To Death
About the game: Road To Death is a first person stealth shooter set in a dark, demonic, terrorist ridden world. You play a young scout trapped in a dire situation. In year 2033 a traumatic event occurred. Terrorists took over the country and even your camp, but you managed to hide till it was clear. Now your all alone and must make it to safety. You travel a dangerous path risking your life for the only help you have. You got no choice but to take chances. You use your minimum knowledge of survival to fight off the terrorists. Shoot and loot your way through the dark while making it to extraction. Avoid deadly apparitions. Survive massive levels and loot resources. Fight against waves of zombies in the new zombie mode. Complete goals to advance further into the game. You can gun it quick or take it slow and explore the creepy environment that takes place.
